The Fastest Growing Companies list is unusual for Fortune.
Unlike the Fortune 500, it's not a bunch of names you already know.
What it really is a bunch of up-and-comers.
In fact in the past, companies like Starbucks, Dell and Microsoft...
...appeared on this list many years before they became national names.
There are a bunch of companies from China, there are health care companies,...
...there are energy companies, all of which you'd expect.
And then in the end, there are always the wild cards.
